Name: Outmayer
Review Text:
Stopped here for quick breakfast sandwich and coffee ☕️
Sandwiches was good, coffee ok.
Prices bit high, as expected in city center

Name: Outmayer
Review Text: Such a great little eatery! Our sandwiches were delicious and the service was fantastic.

Name: Outmayer
Review Text: Food was nice and expectable prices for the city center. Nice chill place and the staff was really nice and helpful.

Name: Outmayer
Review Text: Overall was nice, food a bit dry and prices were a little high :)

Name: Outmayer
Review Text: Wrap and the waffle were dry, prices ok

Name: Outmayer
Review Text:
Great, fresh, good vibes...
& friendly service

Name: Outmayer
Review Text: Bad hygiene! Your tosti is prepared in front of you, right on top of the counter (no plate or anything). No gloves or hand washing between handling money and preparing food.

Name: Outmayer
Review Text: Very clean.  Nice staff.  Good cakes! Excellent hot chocolate.

Name: Outmayer
Review Text: Very rude staff, (2 young ladies), no education modals, no customer service attitude, food is average; dont go there.

Name: Outmayer
Review Text: bad staff. very bad. food not worth the money. not very tasty.
